title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-8.7 - Section 86-8.7 apgs and relative weights
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-8.7 - Section 86-8.7 apgs and relative weights

State Regulations
(a) The table of APG weights, procedure based weights and units, and APG fee schedule fees and units for each effective period are published on the New York State Department of Health website at: http://www.health.state.ny.us/health_ care/medicaid/rates/apg/docs/apg_payment_components.xls

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-8.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
